text: In a hot debate before New Hampshire Primary School, Hillary Clinton and Bernie Sanders sharpened their contradictions. Clinton, who appeared on a stage at the University of New Hampshire in Durham, targeted Sanders ' relative lack of expertise in national security. Clinton said: "A team of national security experts has issued a statement that is very relevant to the views of Sean Sanders on foreign policy and national security, referring to some of the comments he has made on these issues."
